name: C.H.A.Z. Gardening Simulator
description:
A game made for 

Mix and Game Jam (2020)

Theme was mixing genres.

My original idea was to have some sort farm sim mix with papers please.

controls

 WASD =move

E = interact

Left mouse = Attack

P and Esc = menu

Music by

Cosmic Famicommunist

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnZVxzmY7-Qw12AuAQUModw

and

Pan Ziyue

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWFUXHLiQ0qlM-jPvvngA0A
